title: You know Rito there's something I've been wanting to get off my chest for awhile...
body: League's a pretty good game. Thanks for letting me play it.

replies.body: for free.
"Free" XD I wonder how many people actually have spent no money playing this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Sang Noir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-26T17:17:18.376+0000)
>
> "Free" XD I wonder how many people actually have spent no money playing this game.

When people say Free to Play, they mean that you won't be at a disadvantage if you don't spend money on it. Other games have 'free to play' models, but if you don't spend real currency to buy that 20x gold rate crate or for Mega Ultra Empowered Super armor you won't be as strong as other players. 

Spending money is a purely aesthetic thing. You could argue that buying rune pages is an advantage, but you can easily get to high elo with only 2 pages.
try getting some rune pages there a shit ton of ip and dont had gameplay like champions

> [{quoted}](name=Predatorkiller0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=0002000000010001,timestamp=2015-07-26T19:10:00.599+0000)
>
> try getting some rune pages there a shit ton of ip and dont had gameplay like champions

I have 8 runepages, almost half of the champions, and I've never spent RP for anything but skins. 

It's not as hard as people make it seem (I started playing a little after Yasuo was released. )

what the anus man, do you not sleep?  ive been playing since the start of season 3 and ive got 34 champs left and only 4 rune pages (the second 2 were from a 2 for 1 sale), and ive bought several champs with rp, including some getting gifted

edit: what in this comment is making it downvoted?

> [{quoted}](name=I Main Swain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=000200000001000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-27T02:53:56.778+0000)
>
> what the anus man, do you not sleep?  ive been playing since the start of season 3 and ive got 34 champs left and only 4 rune pages (the second 2 were from a 2 for 1 sale), and ive bought several champs with rp, including some getting gifted

No, no I don't sleep. 

http://41.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ly80fzD7271r5jtugo1_500.jpg

I just made sure to only buy rune pages during the 2 for 1 sales. I also never really bought any 6300 champs unless they went on pricedrop due to a champion being released. And of the newer champions after Yasuo came out, I think I only ever bought Vel, Ekko, and Azir lol.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=0002000000010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-27T04:36:23.434+0000)
>
> No, no I don't sleep. 
> 
> http://41.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ly80fzD7271r5jtugo1_500.jpg
> 
> I just made sure to only buy rune pages during the 2 for 1 sales. I also never really bought any 6300 champs unless they went on pricedrop due to a champion being released. And of the newer champions after Yasuo came out, I think I only ever bought Vel, Ekko, and Azir lol.

I have all the champions except {{champion:51}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:106}} 

I also have 17 full rune pages

I've never spent RP to buy any rune page or champion, with the exceptions of {{champion:120}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:50}} - There was also {{champion:8}} which was a gift of a former boyfriend, and {{champion:150}}, which I bought the bundle with RP that also granted me his release skin, that was when he was released of course.

Other than those exceptions, every champion, rune, and rune page I currently own were bought with IP instead of RP. Yes, I have a lot of free time. Yes, I DO sleep.

I started the same time with only 4 completed rune pages,no RP
 o.O
I don't know if TF2 is the same. I mean if you buy weapons there are negatives too it. Like +50% dmg, but -50 HP
You know what wins games in TF2? Hats. Hats win wars; especially unusual hats.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2015-07-26T17:48:41.626+0000)
>
> When people say Free to Play, they mean that you won't be at a disadvantage if you don't spend money on it. Other games have 'free to play' models, but if you don't spend real currency to buy that 20x gold rate crate or for Mega Ultra Empowered Super armor you won't be as strong as other players. 
> 
> Spending money is a purely aesthetic thing. You could argue that buying rune pages is an advantage, but you can easily get to high elo with only 2 pages.

like hearthstone
never paid a dime
That picture should be for Hearthstone imo
Me, but I play since S1 and I earned enough IP to buy anything (except skins). But if something ever happened to my account and I had to start all over again, I'd just quit.

> [{quoted}](name=Sang Noir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-26T17:17:18.376+0000)
>
> "Free" XD I wonder how many people actually have spent no money playing this game.

never spent any money on this game.
I have spent a lot more money on LoL than I'd like to admit.
I have only spent a bit, mostly only from gifts and birthday stuff.  But until recently I have spent no money on this game

> [{quoted}](name=Rikari,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-26T16:09:00.611+0000)
>
> for free.

Its pay to win. Not free.
I guess you **can** have nice things
For _free_

Nothing is free, _ever_.
This game simply costs time instead of money

That depends on how you would classify 'cost'.  It isn't taking your time as far as I see it, it is filling up my free time because it's entertaining.

I would say that waiting for a bus or sleeping costs time, I would say that playing league is a leisure activity that only benefits me.
Time spent enjoying yourself is still time spent

Not pay to win. Easy to pick up but hard to master, impossible to 100% master too. Diversity in terms of play style, no two games are alike. It is really fun and engaging to play. They may mess up from time to time, but nothing is perfect. Putting it into perspective too, this game has so many variables and so many things that can get messed up, they do a pretty good job of keeping this game relatively balanced all the time. It really is a great game.
Thanks Rito~!
Don't expect this thread to get far, everyone here is to much of a pessimist to let anything positive get anywhere.
That's pretty pessimistic of you. The thread is currently #3 in the HOT list.
I stopped trying to show any optimism, theirs much bullshit here to keep it up.

Gosh... people on here rant so much (myself included) that I often forget to take the time, in the face of those few problems, to say how much Rito did right.  I mean, they've made a pretty awesome, pretty massive game and its free to play.  They did all that for us to enjoy, so I too will say thanks Rito.

If League isn't a great game people won't be complaining about problems. We complain because we want the game to be perfect since we enjoy it so much.
 # Deep #Thoughtful#
actually, you need skins. skins get wins ;)
but of course. thats why i have a job
This guy speaks the truth. Thanks is something we all need to give every once in a while.
You are strong a strong person, being able to admit something like that. We're here for you.

I think the primary reason people have been so vocal about the changes is because they are worried.
They are worried that these changes may cause League of Legends to lose its standing as the top MOBA game. Worried that Riot may have become too insular. Worried that League of Legends may be heading down hill.

The reason people complain on the board isn't because they hate League of Legends, it is because they love it.

>They are worried that these changes may cause League of Legends to lose its standing as the top MOBA game. Worried that Riot may have become too insular. Worried that League of Legends may be heading down hill.
> 
> The reason people complain on the board isn't because they hate League of Legends, it is because they love it.

I'd love to see that happen. Maybe then, perhaps, someday somebody who can properly develop a game like this will get some space to do so.

But Graves still can't have a cigar.
This post has nothing to do with "Gameplay & Balance".
Unless he likes the gameplay and the balance in this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gg6ovg2W,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-07-27T09:12:19.097+0000)
>
> Unless he likes the gameplay and the balance in this game.

Can't be.

I think out of all the F2P games, this one is the only one I'm satisfied with my actual purchases.  I always feel regret after spending money on other F2P games, even Hearthstone.  But this game is quality
Yep

All people that think league of legends is free to play are idiots...
And since this is NA i wouldnt be suprised that most NA players
are brainwashed idiots.
league is not a Pay to win game, like most of games nowadays... This is why its so popular and everyone like it.

Op gave a nice gesture to bad it is all wrong. Riot does do all their work so you can have fun playing a game it is done to make them money. The fact it is free to play it simply because they felt a free to play model will in the end earn them the most money.

Sadly riot should be thanking you for playing their game if not for all of us they would make no money have no job etc...
It sure is
I don't know man, most of the people playing this game evidently aren't having fun when they do it. Be careful what you post.
OP is low on content and originality.  Upvoted anyway.  I couldn't help it.
a "good" thread for once :o
A very good game plagued by a horrible community and a company that doesn't care at all about improving it :(
